attributes.action: Allow the public to vote on the legalisation of cannabis
attributes.additional_details:
Recent studies have shown the potential medicinal benefits of cannabis. 

Countries around the globe have begun legalisation and I believe its time we follow suit. Cannabis legalisation could benefit the economy massively alongside lowering crime rates across the country.
attributes.background: Allow the general public to vote on the legalisation of cannabis flower and other cannabis products for medical and recreational use
